title: The Drunk and the Dead
description: Ever wonder what it would be like to go to an Alcoholics Anonymous meeting and find all your favorite monsters trying a twelve step program?How about what a zombie’s thoughts are as he roams from place to place?Have you often agonized over the burning question, were there undead in the Old West?Well, now you can have these questions and more answered in author Andy Taylor’s new collection of three short stories, The Drunk and the Dead.In Drunken Monsters we find all the greats including, but not limited to, Count Dracula, The Phantom of the Opera, The Wolfman, and even Imhatop, younger cousin to the more famous Imhotep, attending an AA meeting where things aren’t quite what they seem.There Are Needs and There Are Needs tells the tale of Max Triskin, a lonely alcoholic living in the small old western town of Pecanon, WY, a town beset by the undead.Last, but never least, When a Zombie’s Heart Breaks is based on the true story of, okay, the kinda true story…the not at all true at all story of The San Antonio Death Note, the last written statement of a very dedicated zombie.So cuddle up next to your undead soulmate, and get ready for some frightening laughs.
author: Andy  Taylor
